value:
I hope these gifts bring some solace
to suffering hearts.

On this Day of Devotion, Valentia has
been blessed with peace. It must be
Mother Mila's divine power at work...

I'm sure your admirers are many.
You must be inundated with love
letters.

I would like to see the festivities, but I
do not know where to start. Care to
join me? How exciting this is!

One for Faye, one for Jesse, and one
for Alm and Celica. Oh, and I mustn't
forget my friends from the priory!

Here: a token of thanks for all your
hard work. Go ahead, open it!
It's from $Nf.

I feel the light of Mila's blessing.
A Day of Devotion indeed...
All of this is thanks to you.

Oh, I'm so sorry! I seem to have run
out of gifts.

I cannot accept such a generous gift.
Well...maybe I can.

I am Silque! I have been eagerly
waiting to celebrate the Day of
Devotion with you.

I usually thank others who show me
kindness, but sometimes I keep mum
for fear of saying something odd.$k$pAn example comes to mind. Recently
Faye and I happened upon a stall that
sold spun sugar sculptures.$k$pThere was only one left. Though it
was plain that Faye wanted it, she
gave it to me.$k$pI thanked her profusely and without
thinking I blurted out, "I'll treasure
this gift for the rest of my life!"$k$p"I hope not," she snapped at me.
"You'd be far better off eating it
while it's fresh." I felt so foolish.$k$pStill, it's better to express one's
feelings inelegantly than not to
express them at all, don't you think?$k$pI shouldn't let fear stop me from
giving thanks where they're due.
やあっ
これをどうぞ
きゃあっ
いりませんか…？
We'll call it tough love.
I'll put my heart into it.
A gift for you.
For the love of Mila.
Still more love...to give...
ふう…
Mother Mila's love is boundless.
This is for you.
To live is to serve. You have been so kind, so please accept my aid.
Faye is going to love the flower I found today.
I would give anything for just one moment of respite for our troops.
Mother Mila, hear my prayer... May this world become one where people exchange gifts rather than blows.
Would you like a flower? It would look great on you.
Looking forward to it.
Choices, choices…
Who needs assistance?
